abstract: In a gambit to polish its image — JPMorgan Chase will sponsor the “American Giving Awards,” an event that will be televised on Saturday and will profile recipients of Chase donations.
snippet: In a gambit to polish its image — JPMorgan Chase will sponsor the “American Giving Awards,” an event that will be televised on Saturday and will profile recipients of Chase donations.
lead_paragraph: When a television network broadcasts an awards show created by a multinational bank’s marketers, what is it? An advertisement? A tribute to deserving charities? An entertainment spectacle?

headline.main: For Chase, a TV Show to Promote Its Charity
headline.print_headline: For Chase, A TV Show To Promote Its Charity
